means: 可领取退休、养老金或抚恤金的

sentence.Network_cn: 达到领养老金年龄的人

sentence.Network_en: Delaying their retirement by raising pensionable age might make sense.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过提高领取退休金的年龄来延缓他们的退休可能是有意义的.

sentence.Network_en: Delaying their retirement by raising the pensionable age might make sense.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过推迟拿养老金的年龄而让他们迟点退休,可能还有道理.

...“丈夫”(husband) 指供款人的遗孀再婚所嫁的丈夫；“可享抚恤金”(pensionable) 指有资格领取抚恤金。(由1971年第51号第2条代替)
pensionability 可领取退休金资格pensionable 可享退休金；可享抚恤金pensionable age 合资格领取抚恤金的年龄

entry.tran: 有权领取养老金（或退休金、抚恤金）的
entry.def: Pensionable means relating to someone's right to receive a pension.

example.ex: ...civil servants who were nearing pensionable age.
example.tran: 接近领取养老金年龄的公务员

example.ex: ...if his wife has no pensionable earnings.
example.tran: 如果他妻子没有可享受养老金的薪水
